title_zh: 论文发表 | Applied Energy | 时空特征编码的屋顶光伏潜力评估深度学习方法
title_en: Article Publication | APEN | Spatiotemporal Feature Encoded Deep Learning Method for Rooftop PV Potential Assessment
brief_zh: 本研究提出一种深度学习方法，通过整合三维建筑、太阳位置和气象数据，高效准确地预测屋顶阴影并评估光伏潜力。
brief_en: This study proposes a deep learning method that integrates 3D building, solar position, and meteorological data to efficiently and accurately predict rooftop shadows and assess PV potential.

title_zh: 论文发表 | TR part D | 高速公路收费折扣政策与路网扩建对碳排放的影响
title_en: Article Publication | TR part D |Carbon Emission Implications of Toll Discount Policies and Network Expansions in Highway
brief_zh: 本研究通过整合ETC和GIS数据量化收费政策对高速公路碳排放的影响，发现货运转向高速公路可实现系统级减排。
brief_en: This study quantifies toll policies' impacts on highway emissions using ETC-GIS integration, demonstrating system-wide reduction through optimized freight routing.

title_zh: 论文发表 | Nexus | 基于3D建筑足迹和时空数据的全球建筑一体化光伏电站潜力估算
title_en: Article Publication | Nexus | Global estimation of building-integrated facade and rooftop photovoltaic potential by integrating 3D building footprint and spatio-temporal datasets
brief_zh: 该研究通过整合3D建筑模型和时空数据集，评估了全球范围内建筑立面和屋顶光伏发电的潜力。
brief_en: This research assesses the potential of building-integrated photovoltaics (BIPV) on building facades and rooftops globally by integrating 3D building models and spatio-temporal datasets.

title_zh: 论文发表 | ADAPEN | 通过物联网人工智能（AIoT）、地理信息系统（GIS）和气象学的协同作用，推进建筑立面太阳能潜力评估
title_en: Paper published | ADAPEN | Advancing building facade solar potential assessment through AIoT, GIS, and meteorology synergy
brief_zh: 通过结合物联网人工智能（AIoT）、地理信息系统（GIS）和气象数据，提出了一种创新方法，精确评估建筑立面光伏潜力，考虑了三维遮挡效应和城市环境因素。
brief_en: By integrating Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT), Geographic Information Systems (GIS), and meteorological data, an innovative method is proposed to accurately assess building facade photovoltaic potential, considering 3D shading effects and urban environmental factors.

title_zh: 论文发表 | APEN | 基于轨迹数据的电动汽车充电和能耗模式行为建模
title_en: Paper published | APEN | Modeling electric vehicle behavior: Insights from long-term charging and energy consumption patterns through empirical trajectory data
brief_zh: 通过长期实证数据分析和分类不同类型电动汽车的充电行为，揭示电动汽车在空间和时间维度上的规律性充电模式与潜在需求
brief_en: Through long-term empirical data analysis and classification of charging behaviors of different types of electric vehicles, reveal the regular charging patterns and potential demand of electric vehicles in spatial and temporal dimensions
